base_description: Rectangular object, gray and blue, medium size.
part_description: Two parts: a blue cube and a gray rectangular prism. The blue cube is attached to one end of the gray prism, both aligned in a straight line.
internal_interaction_description: The blue cube and gray rectangular prism are seamlessly connected, forming a continuous structure. The blue part serves as a distinct section, possibly indicating a functional or aesthetic division within the object. The parts are aligned along their length, suggesting structural integration.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces due to its rectangular shape. The blue section might indicate an interactive or functional area for users to engage with, depending on its intended use. Its shape allows it to fit alongside other similar objects or within designated spaces.
